dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent report identifies potential influences but lacks a definitive root cause, missing the clear identification of CM as the cause.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is partially captured with mentions of DDR and voting mechanisms, but lacks the full CM to VCORE linkage.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The report accurately mentions VCORE and DDR percentages but misses some CPU frequency details.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical but lacks a definitive conclusion on the root cause, correctly ruling out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are relevant and practical, focusing on DDR voting mechanisms.
